comments: I would've rated it 5 stars if it was somehow faster. I just want to fastforward all the animation that is happening there. I mean I saw it the first time. Great. I got it: "cat jumps into a boat and then goes underwater, after that it goes out". All this animation takes more time than the actual playing. Same thing with letters: I get letters every time. And I've stoped reading them cause there is a lot of text and I have no idea what for. Inspite of that - it's a good game. Nice and simple

I think this is a really cute game so far. Nice time waster. Couple of problems with reading letters, sometimes it will say "new" and nothing is there, or I try to read the letter and it ends and I can't scroll. Another plus would be to add how many fish are needed to get gold in the fish trophy category. Overall, still a really cute game. Worth the install no doubt!

Ads aren't a problem in this game. As for the game itself, my girlfriend and I love it. It's a good time waster and it can get pretty addicting. Some reviews expressed annoyance at the price of upgrades, but we have almost fully upgraded our gun and tank and it's been fine. We get about 40,000 each catch so far, so exchanging for parts is no big deal. Maybe people just haven't figured out how to be more efficient.

This game is just perfect. It has a complete free to play style and doesn't force ads upon you, instead, they are completely optional to get extra currency or more time. You could go through the entire game without watching a single dad if you wanted to and I love these types of games. The graphics are adorable and the controls are easy. I highly recommend this game.

Fun and relaxed game that I can easily see myself spending hours sniping fish. There is a bit of strategy to the game with the changing weather, predators, and upgrade system. Blindly shooting your harpoon will just lead to short, frustrating sessions so its best to learn the mechanics quickly or you'll end up with pretty sad catches. Thankfully, its a straightforward game so most should have no problem with it. With all the features, its well worth an install/play. Bonus? The ads are entirely optional and provide YOU bonuses.

I like it alot but the issue with it is that prices go up to fast and you dont get enough when you upgrade things, its almost pointless. Other than this MAJOR issue its great! In sereosness i do enjoy playing this game alot and i recomend it to you all!

comments: I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

I paid the price to get the ads removed, because I like to support developers and because there were a LOT of ads. The ads were never removed. I have contacted the developers more than once and received no response. Then I contacted the Play Store and they rejected my claim. Now I have paid for the ads to be removed and they are still there at a level that makes the game unplayable. Worst customer service ever; what a waste of money. I will remember this developer and never download another of their apps.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.

Far too many ads. One here and there is understandable but after every single try, you get an add. Definitely uninstalled for that reason. As far as the game itself, it's really fun and could be addicting but I spent more time trying to get through the ads than I did playing the game.

EDIT TO PREVIOUS REVIEW: I PAYED FOR AD FREE AND REINSTALLED IT AND NO LONGER HAVE AD FREE!  I loved basically all of it except... If you don't buy ad free the game is completely unbearable with how many ads there are. Also I absolutely hate how it kicks me out of the challenges after I die if I tap too many times or I hold the screen while waiting for it to load.

description: Because of the holidays, this high school girl got fat and she urgently needs to suit her special outfit for the school opening. You are assigned to be her personal trainer that will help her to gain the desired weight and aspect in a very short time. In this dress up game, you will be a fashion designer as much as a gym trainer. Put her to work and make sure she accomplish all the exercises you've recommended to her in order to lose weight as soon as possible. Follow the given instructions and try to do all the types of movements in the right order and using the proper procedure for each device aside. Once in a  while, you will offer a pause to hydrate and to erase the sweat. Go through the whole circuit and get all the things done. When all the needed calories are burned you can move to feeding part which is an important step in an equilibrate life. You will have to cook the food that will be good for her condition but still has the proteins that her body requires. You will prepare a delicious chicken soup with vegetables that will be her meal after the training. Now that you have seen how the exercise and the cooking part should be done you can go to the dressing room. Choose a proper makeup, put on a dress that will help this girl stand out her silhouette now that she work so hard to have it. Add a pair of matching shoes, maybe some shiny accessories and don't forget to arrange the final touches.There are many appealing features this game provides and you are able to check them in this rubric:- Experience a wonderful gameplay- Free to play- Pretty accessories and great clothing- Transform a messy girl into a beautiful teenager- Be a fashion designer and a trainer too- Cute clothing with unique details on- Have fun playing interactive activities with a nice girl- Discovering new types of exercises and why not, try them yourself- Learning the importance of a good and healthy lifestyle- Help a girl to regain her wished weight

description: The new Super Panther Hero is in town, Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery game is the new Super villain fighting game of the house. It will bring you a whole new story with the amazing twists and turns. It will take you to a ride of the millennium. Test the real badness in the Super Panther Hero. Super panther hero fights with city cops with the help of evil powers and escape in front of city police in this Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City game.Being bad is also a good thing. Enjoy the life of a bank robber in Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery. Play as a Super villain in Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City. Being a Villain not only mean to kill and steal but you also need to run for your own life. There are also so many life turning events in the game that you will not only play the game but will also live the game.Game Play:Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is exciting game with thrilling gameplay where you have left your old town and came to the city with a lot of dreams which you believed will come true. As you have landed on the bus stop some thugs tried to steal from you and you accidentally killed them with your power. They were the members of the Foot Clan a well-known Gangsters and Mafia organized Ganged that have all the good and the bad in their pockets.Even the Gods have the rivals so do the man. The rivals of the foot clans have seen what you can do and need to help them to rob the bank for them. Otherwise he will be handed over to the foot clan and will be executed. You will need to rob the bank. Sneak in to the bank at night and beat all in your way. Make sure you make it out alive coz police will be standing out to catch you.Beat them all and Escape in the world Fastest Super Car. Feel the need for fast speed and escape like smoke. Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery is not only running from the police but you will also need to out run the thugs and Gangsters.Lighting hero will also be looking for you everywhere so you need to escape the city before they all catch you. You need to escape the city as soon as possible. Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is the Super Panther Bank Robbery game.Key Features:‚Ä¢	Story mode with the most Amazing Story of the year.‚Ä¢	Game with the animated Cut Scene.‚Ä¢	New Game Changing Environment (Indoor and Out Door Environment).‚Ä¢	Super-Fast Cars.‚Ä¢	Amazing Game play and smooth controls.Being bad and the most furious Super Villain also means driving super cars, robbing a bank, money and all that money can buy. Enjoy the thug life of the Vice City as a Super Panther Hero. Ultimate Super Panther Villain has his own powers that can help him to escape the police and Gangsters of the city. Lighting Hero is the savior of the city you will also need to escape him as well. Lighting Hero is Super-fast that time seems to stop. You don‚Äôt need to be afraid as you have the power of a panther inside you. Save your life with the help of your evil powers and fight with speed hero in this Super Panther hero Bank Robbery: Crime City action game.

comments: Loved the game, however as outlined by other users the coin system is bizzare. Packs 1-5 can be opened easily, however after that you simply cannot get enough coins to progress. Tried watching ads to collect coins but ran out of ads to watch (without even getting enough coins, had 50, needed 250 for the next pack, thats 125 ads! grr)

A fantastic game ruined by microtransactions. A fun mechanic and challenging puzzles, but you only get the first few packs for free. After that, you don't earn enough coins to open more packs, at which point you have to wait 6 hours for 10 coins, or watch an additional for a measly 2. I'd love to recommend this game but just can't in its current state.  EDIT: After waiting a couple of days and saving up coins, I unlocked one more pack. It's slow, but the game is quite compelling when you do get to play it. I would now recommend this game, just don't expect to play it too often.

I'm totally addicted to this game, but after the 10th pack or so u don't have enough coins to buy anything. I rushed through all the levels and never used hints or the double coin thing. And now I'm stuck, I can't do anything. The daily 6 "maps" are like 3 minutes of fun and cost more as you get in return. Maybe don't make the packs so expansive or give more coins for faster clearing. Idk I just want to play this game it's to much fun. Please fix it. I love this game ‚ù§Ô∏è

Simple and relaxing Sudoku-style puzzle, mostly trains attention as you look for opportunities to gradually eliminate unknown cells. Hints are awesome as they seem to know exactly where you're stuck, and teach new methods along the way.   Economy is odd, as you progress packs cost more so become unprofitable -- you can watch ads to gain a little more, but still not enough (plus, app detects WiFi at start and can't see it if switched on in game).  Still, a nice little puzzle with a lot of simple levels, until you hit the paywall.

If only for the game, I would've given it 5 stars. But the ridiculous system of gaining coins forces you to wait days before you can actually play a bit more. I don't understand what's the point of getting coins if you have to use them to get the next level, if you want us to buy the game then list it as a buy only product

This is a really neat puzzle game, but the monetization is terrible. Once the packs get more expensive, you have to wait a long time, watch a ton of ads, or pay for coins. I'd be willing to support the game, but buying all puzzles would cost more than 20 USD, which is not worth it.

description: When the lights in this supermarket dim, and the cashier and staff head home, magic happens! The fruits and veggies ‚Äì Quin the Cucumber, Addi the Potato, Kai the Pineapple, Nina the Banana, Han the Pumpkin and Otto the Tomato ‚Äì come alive.  And when they do, get ready to have a blast!  Because in this supermarket, anything goes!   Want to shop with Otto the Tomato?  He‚Äôll be there with you as you grab pasta or pizzas or ice cream right from the shelves.  In this pretend play shopping game, kids of all ages -- girls and boys ‚Äì can shop ‚Äòtil they drop! And as they shop, they can go wild and litter the store with groceries.  Or they can play it neat, and pack up their carts like pros!Hungry after all that shopping?  No problem.  Quin the Cucumber can join you as you slice bread, cheese and meats and make a giant sandwich.  Or grab Addi the Potato and he‚Äôll be with you as you mix-up some flour and bake fresh bread -- yummy!  Thirsty?  You‚Äôre covered.  Toss some juice in the blender and stir up a cool, delicious smoothie ‚Äì then offer a sip to Kai the Pineapple.   Ready for dessert?  Whip up your own cotton candy or churn out your own tasty ice cream‚Ä¶you can bet Han the Pumpkin would love it if you offered him a bite!Done eating?  Head into the games and puzzles section with Nina the Banana and play for hours.  Or, hand a mic to your fruit and veggie friends and see what they suggest.  There are hours of foods to cook and games to play, and whatever you decide to do, you can feel safe knowing this is a completely kid and baby friendly supermarket. descriptionHTML:
When the lights in this supermarket dim, and the cashier and staff head home, magic happens! The fruits and veggies – Quin the Cucumber, Addi the Potato, Kai the Pineapple, Nina the Banana, Han the Pumpkin and Otto the Tomato – come alive. And when they do, get ready to have a blast! Because in this supermarket, anything goes!

Want to shop with Otto the Tomato? He’ll be there with you as you grab pasta or pizzas or ice cream right from the shelves. In this pretend play shopping game, kids of all ages -- girls and boys – can shop ‘til they drop! And as they shop, they can go wild and litter the store with groceries. Or they can play it neat, and pack up their carts like pros!

Hungry after all that shopping? No problem. Quin the Cucumber can join you as you slice bread, cheese and meats and make a giant sandwich. Or grab Addi the Potato and he’ll be with you as you mix-up some flour and bake fresh bread -- yummy! Thirsty? You’re covered. Toss some juice in the blender and stir up a cool, delicious smoothie – then offer a sip to Kai the Pineapple. Ready for dessert? Whip up your own cotton candy or churn out your own tasty ice cream…you can bet Han the Pumpkin would love it if you offered him a bite!

Done eating? Head into the games and puzzles section with Nina the Banana and play for hours. Or, hand a mic to your fruit and veggie friends and see what they suggest. There are hours of foods to cook and games to play, and whatever you decide to do, you can feel safe knowing this is a completely kid and baby friendly supermarket.

INTERACTIVE FUN
• A huge selection of items to choose from and play with
• Dispense candies, blend smoothies, whip cotton candy, toast bread, churn ice cream, bake bread, make sandwiches, fry eggs, cook pizzas, dress up characters in hats, arrange jigsaw puzzles, snap pictures, and so much more

CUTE & CUDDLY CHARACTERS
• All your favorite Fruits Vs Veggies characters are set to talk to you, sing to you, and have fun with you
• Give them food to eat or simply a hat to wear – they’ll love it!

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES
• Since the goal of the game is only to enjoy, make the Fruits Vs Veggies stars do whatever you like…you control all the characters
• Food, drinks, toasters, ovens, toys, puzzles, games, clothes – there is something here for everybody.

HIGHLIGHTS
• Fun, safe and simple gameplay for kids
• 6 lovable characters from the Fruits Vs Veggies universe with unique voices
• Tons of items to play with
• Mix and match to get unique items
• Giant scrollable supermarket background
• Easy controls
• Fresh veggie graphics
• Much more…
developerAddress:
KINSANE ENTERTAINMENT INC.
245 EAST, 24TH STREET, 17J,
NEW YORK, NY 10010
summary: Explore a supermarket with the Fruits and the Veggies and shop, cook and play!
title: Fruits Vs Veggies - Supermarket

description: Euro Truck : Driving Simulator Cargo Delivery Game is a newly designed game open world driving game as the user will drive the euro cargo truck. The game features dual mode, one of which is free mode where the basic objective of the user is to survive in this track. Travel across many countries from Europe, visit incredible places like Berlin, Prague, Madrid, Rome, Paris and more! Play the career mode of this truck simulator, make money. The second mode is level mode as the user has to pass through certain checkpoints to reach the destination. Face extreme truck parking challenges with in time across open world environment. Enjoy 4 wheel and 8x8 offroad trucking on speed roads as the user will drive through treacherous road. The user will drive the the American truck and take ultimate risk as the user will drive the heavy duty truck. Become a truck driver in this exciting new truck simulation game. Get in your truck and deliver cargo to your destination. The track is exclusively design and driving through this track is the most realistic offroad driving experience.The user will drive the pickup truck and deliver multiple goods and items, the user has to pass through these tracks which are rugged terrains. Smash into traffic, cause chaos and drift around on the winter ice roads, Load cargo, detach your trailer and have fun becoming the ultimate truck driver. Avoid losing and falling any cargo box or your mission will be lost.   These bumpy roads really tests the user skill as the main challenge for the user is to don‚Äôt let the barrels drop of the truck. Feel like a real Trucker and deliver heavy packages loaded in your Euro truck. Operate big trucks to deliver packages. The track features both uphill and downhill drive as the user explore the truck and deliver cargo items.  Prove your driving skills by transporting cargo from one place to another in limited time safely. In this adventure of offroad truck the transporter driver will drive offroad cargo truck on dangerous high mountains, bridges and bumpy hills. Following are some amazing features:üöô	Realistic graphics.üöô	Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.üöô	Real Cargo truck off road tracksüöô	Realistic 3D camera angles.üöô	Multiple controller with both tilt and tappy buttons.üöô	Amazing sound effects (SFX).üöô	Various visual effects (VFX).üöô	Dynamic Goods transport challenging levels.üöô	Efficient processing with maximum Frames per second.üöô	Various innovative 3D camera view.üöô	Detailed instrument with speedometer and fuel gauge.üöô	Smooth control with efficient response.üöô	Ride on the dirt surface ramp.üöô	Drift & Drive as long as you can.üöô	Easy to drive and easy to handle.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Grand StickMan GO, a game where you have total control over Stickman! Stickman has never been involved in such troubles, so you will have something to do.

Jump into the huge shaft and glide through the air to move between the obstacles. Collect money to buy bonuses!

Be ready to get a dose of adrenaline, because there is only one way to stop - to break!

Do not forget to use the bonuses! With the help of bonuses you can resurrect Stickman or speed up if you do not have time!

Fly as far as possible and you will have reason to brag to your friends!

The game, inspired by Stickman Base Jumper, but in having a 3D graphics and a real simulation of air basejumping


Grand StickMan GO Features

- 3D game from the third person in the style of Stickman
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- A mesmerizing fall down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamically generated trace
- Realistic effects: airflow and clouds
- Special modes of Stick war, Stickbot, Stick dismount, Stickman and gun, Stickman fight, Stickman Parkour, Stickman Spiderman, Stickman GTA, Stickman Gun, Stickman shooting, Stickman fight.
summary: A unique game about Stickman!
title: Grand StickMan GO

Santa can give gifts to people on the road or wish them Happy Christmas or take up missions to deliver gift on time. On every mission the Santa Grows big. Yes you are right. Santa becomes bigger on every mission completion. How big Santa you want to see this 2017 Christmas? Santa can driver bike, Car, truck also he has his special vehicle in the city, and you guessed it correctly its Santa Sled. descriptionHTML:
Weddings in India vary regionally, the religion and per personal preferences of the bride and groom. They are festive occasions in India, and in most cases celebrated with extensive decorations, colors, music, dance, costumes and rituals that depend on the religion of the bride and the groom, as well as their preferences. India celebrates about 10 million weddings per year with pride and honour.

While there are many festival-related rituals in Hindu weddings is the most extensive persogs (wednal) ritual an adult Hindu undertakes in his or her life. Typical Hindu families spend significant effort and financial resources to prepare and celebrate weddings. The rituals and process of a Hindu wedding vary depending on region of India.

Facial:
A facial is a skin care treatments for the face of Indian Bride, including steam, exfoliation, extraction, creams, lotions, facial masks, peels, and massage. Normally performed in beauty salons, but are also a common spa treatment. Used in skin health as well as for specific skin conditions. Apply various types of facial to Bride's face like European facial, LED light therapy facials, and mini-facials. Remove masks by rinsing the face with water and wiping off with a damp cloth. Glam up

Back Spa:
Visit city’s best venue for pre-wedding Spa services. Enjoy bachelorette “Sparties,” afternoon and weekend rejuvenation retreats, make-up application for you and your bridal party, nail services and massages. Before you walk down the aisle, unwind in the waterfront relaxation room or utilize the Spa’s pristine facilities. Help Bride with soothing pampering array of massages and body treatments.

Waxing:
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent hair removal which removes the hair from the root. Press calico onto the wax and quickly remove the strip. Soothe Bride's skin by applying aloe based after-wax lotion or gel.

Hand/Leg Spa and Nail Art:
This treatment is done to replenish, restore and rejuvenate naturally tired Bride hands. Hand and Feet spa helps remove dead cells and callous. Rinse gently and apply a rich hand lotion or plant-based serum to help seal in hydration. Clean and choose various styles of bride Nail arts. Rock one of these gorgeous bridal nail art ideas as you walk down the aisle.

Mehndi:
The last major function before the wedding is decoration with temporary henna (mehndi) tattoos. Mehndi artists are called to the houses of the boy and girl and apply mehendi to the palms of the female family members, and the hands and feet of the bride. The Mehandi ceremony takes place in the atmosphere of a party. The bride and other ladies get mehendi (henna designs) done, on their hands and feet (most ladies get it done only on their hands but the bride gets it done on both hands and feet). New and latest bridal mehndi designs for hands and legs. A beautiful selection of Indian and Arabic bridal Mehndi Designs.

Haldi:
Haldi Ceremony involves applying the paste made from turmeric powder and mustard oil all over the girl’s and boy's body by their female friends and relatives. This is done to make the bride and groom look more beautiful on the most special day of their life.

Makeup:
Number of glamorous makeup options which includes charming lipsticks, blushes, eyeshadows, eyelenses, unique hairstyles, bindis and more!

Gajra:
Indian cultural wedding not complete without gajra or flowers in the wedding to make bride look more beautiful! Use from number of lovely gajaras and flowers options.

Dressup:
Latest and beautiful designer ethnic wear as Sarees, Lahengas, Salwar Kameez, lehenga style sarees and more. Traditional silks of Punjabi bridal sarees, Latest Indian wedding wear dresses and clothing in ethnic fashion.

Choose from a simple hairstyle and make-up for Indian Prom or more elaborate styling featuring, a facial, massage, manicure, pedicure, hairstyling and make-up application. You are a team of professionals will do Bride's best to make her feel pampered and beautiful.

The next mission is to clean the area with the help of bulldozer in amusement park .It is the time to make boundary wall in park builder as you are going to bring a wild gorilla in it. description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. The car wash station is fully automatic all you need to do is park the luxury car inside car wash and repair games. Simulate your world and tuneup police car engine inside the repair shop garage. The repair shop garage is located next to the paint shop at highway gas station games. This repair shop garage is equipped with all the latest car mechanic simulator tools. This is perfect blend of top rated games like police car parking and smart car wash games.Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking Game Features:Challenging time based luxury car washing, refuel and paint job levelsMultiple muscle car customization: suv, sedan, prado, corvette, limo Realistic highway service gas station environment to drive onUltra realistic police car physics with real v8 engine soundsSmooth vehicle controls for immersive gameplayDownload Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking games now for FREE & entertain yourself!

comments: Game freezes on the "five digit lock" assessment, could not complete game because of this. Tried restarting app and phone and the bug would still not disappear.  That sucked.

I thoroughly enjoyed this unique style of internship testing. It was confusing as to what the scores meant, but upon receiving psychological feedback of my performance it became clear that these didn't mean anything. I would advise ignoring the scores, avoid trying to beat other players and instead just follow the simple instructions and let it give you feedback at the end which I found to be very insightful.
App crashed multiple times during my assessment which meant I was not able to complete it, potentially jeopardising my internship application.

Such an improvement in comparison to other, more typical, numerical reasoning tests out there. No lengthy wordy questions before making you do simple GCSE maths in an unrealistic amount of time. Instead it just focuses on problem solving and your ability to spot patterns. My only criticism is that the scores at the end are unclear. It said "congratulations your score is: 1000". But 1000 out of a possible what? Im unsure exactly how well i performed because of this. 1000 could be the max score, or it could be just 50%, i have no idea!
It was a good test, but it was unclear what the results at the end meant, as there was no indication of what the maximum number of points available was (on the rota test)
I think this is a good way of doing psychometric tests. Love the feedback pdf at the end of it too! Just one question, what is a good score to get?üòÇ

comments: Alright, so the game is pretty good. All I ask for is more tricks, and the ability to upgrade some bonuses (coin magnet, feather hover thing, and the third one that I haven't grabbed yet.) All in all, if you could do that, it'd make the game so much greater. Apart from skipping missions and revives there's no use for coins.

The thing that makes this game great is the visuals and the audio. It is absulutley beautiful and the art style works so well with the type of game. Without this the game would not be nearly as good as the game play I'd very simple but it would still do ok. However these features are what makes the game. Also the fact that there's a night and day feature gives the game an even bigger opportunity to show the beauty of its art style

Good graphics, but can get boring after only like 3 minutes. Also the makers of the game should add a another different mode where your running away from a villager/camper and see how far you can get. You could improve or modify this mode that i have made if you want

First off, I'd like to give a big thank you to the developers for this game. It's amazing.  However, I've been encountering quite a few bugs lately. One day, picking up a hover feather crashed the game. Today, I can't pick up llama horns, and the background blur that happens when you go into the workshop stayed into an actual run. I took this as a challenge and continued playing. I'm on a Samsung Galaxy Tab A 9.7 running Android Marshmallow.  This is just to tip you guys off on some bugs.

This was the must have game- I think, for a while. Then the newest update came out. Now it has ads you must veiw (before totally optional for more coins or an extra run) and added FTP elements. Took from a 5 star classic, to barely 2 stars. Thankfully, the base game play was untouched, and still well worth the advertisements, but I'm very sad for this move on the part of the dev team.

I have 'noisy' brain and anxiety and sometimes the world is too much to bear. This game keeps me calm and collected all the time. The music and gameplay soothe me up. I do get frustrated over the goals but I have nothing but praise and love for this game. Thank you to everyone involved. You all helped a lot. Cannot wait for Alto's Odyssey for Android!
description: Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders ‚Äì all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.Features:‚Ä¢ Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay‚Ä¢ Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding‚Ä¢ Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more‚Ä¢ Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system‚Ä¢ Chain together combos to maximize points and speed‚Ä¢ Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals‚Ä¢ Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!‚Ä¢ Acquire the wingsuit from Izel‚Äôs workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic‚Ä¢ Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design‚Ä¢ Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)Reviews:"A piece of interactive art"‚Äì WIRED"One of the best mobile games"‚Äì The Verge"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"‚Äì IGN"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"‚Äì TIME
descriptionHTML:
Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

Reviews:

"A piece of interactive art"
– WIRED

"One of the best mobile games"
– The Verge

"Alto's Adventure demands your attention"
– IGN

"Best Looking Video Games of 2015"
– TIME

Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.
5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.
6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.
7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.
8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.


A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. This fighting game has different sniper assasin kill shot levels. Each level of these shooting games has an interesting mission for the sniper assasin. There are a total of 30 sniper shooting kill shot levels. Your objective in fighting games as a sniper assasin is to perform precise kill shot to stay safe.Guidelines for playing this fighting game?You are going to have your sniper rifle on you for the killing in this fighting game as you will need to shoot to keep yourself safe from the enemies. You need to use the sniper rifle in following manner to shoot in fighting games:1. Click on the Zoom button in left bottom corner of the screen in this shooter game.2. Once you have enabled zoom, a bullet button will appear on the right bottom corner of the screen for sniper hunting.3. You can click the bullet button to fire at this stage in this shooter game.4. Aim well with sniper rifle and try to finish your enemy in one shot in this shooter game.5. Touch the bullet button to eliminate your enemy.6. As this shooting game has different levels so accomplish the mission set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this sniper game.7. Once you have cleared a level, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this shooting game.Superiority of this shooting game:You are surely going to love this sniper game over the others due to following salient features:1. Totally Free: This shooting game is totally free!2. Delightful graphics: This sniper game has awesome graphics. Entertaining music: This sniper game has a very entertaining music for your pleasure.4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this assassin game are very realistic and they keep you fully involved in this sniper game.5.	Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this assassin game as the aim is to get better and better until you are totally safe from the soldiers acting as your enemies.6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killing game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully engaged. Each mission is time bound with a specific elimination target of enemies to keep you focused on the job at hand.7. Player Feedback: We are at all times looking for your feedback and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interestingWho is this killing game for?Anybody who wants a shooting challenge should play this killing game. descriptionHTML:
Introduction:

Secret Agent Sniper Shooter 2 Army Sniper Assassin is the best Army Sniper 3D Game of the Secret Agent. An Army Sniper 3D becomes a Sniper Assassin in these shooting games of the sniper shooter. This is a secret agent game of an Army sniper 3D where sniper shooting and kill shot is required by the sniper shooter.

How this 2nd Secret Agent game started:

Our sniper shooter had moved from sniper hunting games to 3D sniper situation in shooting games. The sniper assasin was now handling dangerous fighting games. Though our sniper assassin had seen shooting games and now with sniper shooting skills he had become a sniper 3D. The challenge of shooting games is not a hard task for our sniper assassin in this sniper shooting game.

What is the purpose of these fighting games?

This sniper hunting, shooting and fighting game is all about sniper shooting and kill shot by a sniper assasin. This fighting game has different sniper assasin kill shot levels. Each level of these shooting games has an interesting mission for the sniper assasin. There are a total of 30 sniper shooting kill shot levels. Your objective in fighting games as a sniper assasin is to perform precise kill shot to stay safe.

Guidelines for playing this fighting game?

You are going to have your sniper rifle on you for the killing in this fighting game as you will need to shoot to keep yourself safe from the enemies. You need to use the sniper rifle in following manner to shoot in fighting games:

1. Click on the Zoom button in left bottom corner of the screen in this shooter game.

2. Once you have enabled zoom, a bullet button will appear on the right bottom corner of the screen for sniper hunting.

3. You can click the bullet button to fire at this stage in this shooter game.

4. Aim well with sniper rifle and try to finish your enemy in one shot in this shooter game.

5. Touch the bullet button to eliminate your enemy.

6. As this shooting game has different levels so accomplish the mission set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this sniper game.

7. Once you have cleared a level, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this shooting game.

Superiority of this shooting game:

You are surely going to love this sniper game over the others due to following salient features:

1. Totally Free: This shooting game is totally free!

2. Delightful graphics: This sniper game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience while playing this great assassin game.

3. Entertaining music: This sniper game has a very entertaining music for your pleasure.

4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this assassin game are very realistic and they keep you fully involved in this sniper game.

5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this assassin game as the aim is to get better and better until you are totally safe from the soldiers acting as your enemies.

6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killing game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully engaged. Each mission is time bound with a specific elimination target of enemies to keep you focused on the job at hand.

7. Player Feedback: We are at all times looking for your feedback and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting

Who is this killing game for?

Anybody who wants a shooting challenge should play this killing game. Everyone else looking for endless shooting with sniper rifle can also play this killing game.

What is the best time to play this killing game?

A great thing about this shooter game is that it can be played at anytime. You are at office or at home, whenever you have free time just pull out your sniper rifle and enjoy playing this shooter game.

Please don't forget to rate our game/ provide feedback.

Go enJoy & Thank you!
summary: Secret Agent Sniper Shooter 2 is the best Sniper 3D Game of Army Sniper Assassin
title: Secret Agent Sniper Shooter 2 Army Sniper Assassin

description: You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!
descriptionHTML:
You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!
Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.
Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!
summary: You will be able to manage a large industrial enterprise.
title: Industrialist ‚Äì factory development strategy

description: "Best Mom In The Entire World" game is about the most lovable person in the entire world - 'Mother'. This Mom game includes every quality of a mother to give an ease to their kids or babies. There are so many difficulties for a mother during the period of pregnancy like discomfort in sleeping, routine life and also mom goes through many mentally & physically changes. At the end of the pregnancy, operation theater surgery is carried out in this Pregnant mommy surgery game, which is the hardest time for any mother.After giving birth to the baby, mom's responsibility increases towards the baby care. Newborn baby needs someone all day to play with him and fulfill his needs. Baby cries a lot when he does not feel good. Mom needs to keep entertaining this cute little baby whenever he cries in this babysitter game. Mom needs to face the sorrow when her baby doesn't play with her when she is expecting it. Mom has to work hard to do the work and take care of each and everything of the baby. Mom needs to learn lots of things to handle the baby.This mother game includes the signs of the best mom in the entire world. There are certain qualities of best mom like her kid's bag packing, warm clothes in the cold and lunchbox. Best mom never let their kids feel alone. description: Chinese Lunar New Year is coming! The China Town gets quite busy and happy! The streets are decorated with red lanterns and New Year scrolls. I heard that a new famous Chinese restaurant opened yesterday! This is a big restaurant which contains a drama stage in the centre of the hall. Customers can watch the traditional Beijing opera while they have delicious Chinese foods!People flocked to the Chinese restaurants to celebrate the special Chinese Lunar New Year! My friends and I also decide to go! There are tons of yummy Chinese foods we can try in this restaurant! Such as spring rolls, dim sum, sweet dumplings, fried noodles, fortune cookies and so much more! Gosh! I really don't know which one I should choose! Do you want to try amazing Chinese foods? Well, just come with me! Let's get start right now!Product Features:-A super fun food-making game-Make yummy Chinese foods-Five Chinese foods to make: spring rolls, dim sum, sweet dumplings, fried noodles and fortune cookies -Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: bowls, kettle, spoon, pan, knife, cutting board, induction cooker, dumpling wrapper machine, plates, food steamer, pot, noodles machine, flour sieve, spatula, chopsticks, rolling pin, cup, baking pan, oven and so much more-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: fruits, candies, sprinkles, milk, flour, salt, sugar, butter, eggs, chocolate ice cream, cream, water, meats, veggies, oil, sauce, meat stuffing, food colorings, sticky rice, noodles, black pepper, soy sauce, tea and so much moreHow to play: - Use interactive controls to play the game- Take different cooking modules for spring rolls, dim sum, sweet dumplings, fried noodles and fortune cookies - Try different tools to make your foods- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies and fruits Important Message for Purchases:- This App is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.- By downloading this App you agree to Kids Food Games‚Äô Privacy Policy at https://www.kidsfoodinc.com/privacy/- Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
descriptionHTML:
Chinese Lunar New Year is coming! The China Town gets quite busy and happy! The streets are decorated with red lanterns and New Year scrolls.
I heard that a new famous Chinese restaurant opened yesterday! This is a big restaurant which contains a drama stage in the centre of the hall. Customers can watch the traditional Beijing opera while they have delicious Chinese foods!
People flocked to the Chinese restaurants to celebrate the special Chinese Lunar New Year! My friends and I also decide to go!
There are tons of yummy Chinese foods we can try in this restaurant! Such as spring rolls, dim sum, sweet dumplings, fried noodles, fortune cookies and so much more!
Gosh! I really don't know which one I should choose! Do you want to try amazing Chinese foods? Well, just come with me! Let's get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy Chinese foods
-Five Chinese foods to make: spring rolls, dim sum, sweet dumplings, fried noodles and fortune cookies
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: bowls, kettle, spoon, pan, knife, cutting board, induction cooker, dumpling wrapper machine, plates, food steamer, pot, noodles machine, flour sieve, spatula, chopsticks, rolling pin, cup, baking pan, oven and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: fruits, candies, sprinkles, milk, flour, salt, sugar, butter, eggs, chocolate ice cream, cream, water, meats, veggies, oil, sauce, meat stuffing, food colorings, sticky rice, noodles, black pepper, soy sauce, tea and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different cooking modules for spring rolls, dim sum, sweet dumplings, fried noodles and fortune cookies
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies and fruits

Important Message for Purchases:
- This App is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
- By downloading this App you agree to Kids Food Games’ Privacy Policy at https://www.kidsfoodinc.com/privacy/
- Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
summary: Chinese New Year is HERE! Let's go to China Town and make yummy Chinese foods!
title: Chinese Food! Make Yummy Chinese New Year Foods!

description: Pu is a cute little panda bear who loves to eat, have fun and take selfies. He expects you to feed him, dress him, clean him and take care of him like an animal.Dozens of activities and exciting mini-games are available to take care of your new baby pet.Are you ready to take care of your new and adorable virtual pet ?‚ñ∫  ADOPT PU : Give him a special name and make it evolve to reach his adult size. He is so cute !‚ñ∫  DRESS PU : Make the baby Pu cute and adorable like you ! Dress it up in fashion where to disguise it, create your own look !‚ñ∫  FEED PU : Pu loves the tasty and delicious food, it will feast !‚ñ∫  GIVE A BATH : In order for Pu to be clean and pretty, wash it and dab it.‚ñ∫  PLAY WITH PU : Full of fun mini-games to win coins and make your animal Happy ! But also challenges every day to win diamonds !‚ñ∫  SLEEP TIME : After a happy day, Pu is sleepy, lining it up to make him sleep.‚ñ∫  DECORATE THE HOUSE : The walls, floors, carpet, bathtub and still other elements to make your home unique !This game is a free virtual animal game created by a small independent developer, a game that caters girls and boys and that I hope you will enjoy.WHO IS THE GIANT PANDA BEAR?Pu is an adorable baby pet.He does not know how to care and take care of himself so he expects you to teach him ! Here are a few tips to make him happy and cheerful: Check that he has always eaten enough and that he is clean !Pu is very gambler, he does not ask much time, play games a few minutes with him and he will be very happy and affectionate but be careful, after playing well it must be given a bath and bed.He will then be in good shape and will grow quietly.If you dream of taking care an animal and looking after a cute virtual baby animal, to see it grow, this game is perfect for you !Adopt Pu and do in the happiest pets, you have to play !This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.This game is not primarily directed to children under the age of 13.
descriptionHTML:
Pu is a cute little panda bear who loves to eat, have fun and take selfies. He expects you to feed him, dress him, clean him and take care of him like an animal.
Dozens of activities and exciting mini-games are available to take care of your new baby pet.
Are you ready to take care of your new and adorable virtual pet ?

► ADOPT PU : Give him a special name and make it evolve to reach his adult size. He is so cute !
► DRESS PU : Make the baby Pu cute and adorable like you ! Dress it up in fashion where to disguise it, create your own look !
► FEED PU : Pu loves the tasty and delicious food, it will feast !
► GIVE A BATH : In order for Pu to be clean and pretty, wash it and dab it.
► PLAY WITH PU : Full of fun mini-games to win coins and make your animal Happy ! But also challenges every day to win diamonds !
► SLEEP TIME : After a happy day, Pu is sleepy, lining it up to make him sleep.
► DECORATE THE HOUSE : The walls, floors, carpet, bathtub and still other elements to make your home unique !

This game is a free virtual animal game created by a small independent developer, a game that caters girls and boys and that I hope you will enjoy.

WHO IS THE GIANT PANDA BEAR?
Pu is an adorable baby pet.
He does not know how to care and take care of himself so he expects you to teach him ! Here are a few tips to make him happy and cheerful: Check that he has always eaten enough and that he is clean !
Pu is very gambler, he does not ask much time, play games a few minutes with him and he will be very happy and affectionate but be careful, after playing well it must be given a bath and bed.
He will then be in good shape and will grow quietly.

If you dream of taking care an animal and looking after a cute virtual baby animal, to see it grow, this game is perfect for you !
Adopt Pu and do in the happiest pets, you have to play !

This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.
This game is not primarily directed to children under the age of 13.
developerAddress:
52 route de laverune, villa les colibris
34070 Montpellier
France

title: Pu - Cute giant panda bear, baby pet care game

description: In the North Empire, the Annual Death-themed Concert is just around the corner. Prince Miguel is now sending out the invitations. Libby and her friends are all invited to attend this big event. Excited and curious, they arrive at the concert! Oops, they don't have guitars yet. But don't worry, the Prince has got everything. Everyone can make a guitar of their own in the design studio. Yippie~ now, it's time for fun!Features:- Tons of clothes and accessories offer you a free choiceWanna have a look like the dead and draw everyone's attention? Come on, little stylist!- Draw mysterious pets to liven the concert upOpen the gift box and draw one pet after each mini game. Show us your talent!- The Annual Coco Music Festival means wild cry and pleasureThe applause, spotlight, cheers... it's gonna be a sleepless night! descriptionHTML:
In the North Empire, the Annual Death-themed Concert is just around the corner. Prince Miguel is now sending out the invitations. Libby and her friends are all invited to attend this big event. Excited and curious, they arrive at the concert! Oops, they don't have guitars yet. But don't worry, the Prince has got everything. Everyone can make a guitar of their own in the design studio. Yippie~ now, it's time for fun!

Features:
- Tons of clothes and accessories offer you a free choice
Wanna have a look like the dead and draw everyone's attention? Come on, little stylist!
- Draw mysterious pets to liven the concert up
Open the gift box and draw one pet after each mini game. They're gonna make your journey even more unforgettable.
- Guitar DIY makes a perfect music journey
Seeing everyone has their own musical instruments, and wanna have one of your own? Show us your talent!
- The Annual Coco Music Festival means wild cry and pleasure
The applause, spotlight, cheers... it's gonna be a sleepless night! Just put your hands up and enjoy!

About Libii:
With over 600 million downloads and growing, Libii is committed to creating innovative games for girls. We'll keep working on establishing a good relationship with both parents and their children and bringing a healthy, happy atmosphere for them.
Visit us: http://www.libii.com/
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/LibiiGame
Contact us: Got any ideas? Suggestions? Need technical support? Please feel free to contact us 24/7 at WeCare@libii.com

This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

description: Mafia, gangsters and criminals are getting around to executing a grand robbery mission in shape of bank robbery. Main plan of the robbers is fighting, shooting, killing and even firing the bank staff. Test your mafia and fighting skills by this assault mission. Avail a lifetime chance to show your bravery, firing skills, shooting skills and driving skills by playing Bank Robbery ‚Äì Mafia Gangsters Shooting game. This grand robbery mission must be accomplished at any cost and the criminals and gangsters must be brought to justice. As a brave commando and police officer who is going to save the money of citizen and bring peace back to the grand city, arrest the culprits and kill them all. Act like a bravo professional anti criminal power with super strange skills. Show your hold on snipers and guns, leave them stunt with your pro skills using weapons against the criminals in the city robbery. Gangsters are the best at shooting, killing and making strategies. Defeat them in their city robbery mission; crush them before they carry out bank robbery mission in the city. The criminals of San Andreas and Vegas have gathered again for the purpose of bank robbery.Attack powers of robbers, attack their skills and use snipers and sniper skills to defeat the mafia in street bank robbery mission. Be brave and shoot all the gangster criminals before they run away, kill them on spot, and don‚Äôt have mercy. Professional robbers have planned a new robbery heist. Experience new heist and advanced driving controls. Gangsters syndicate has planned a big bank robbery to steal gold and diamonds. Play as a police officer against bank robbers and terminate grand theft. Drive cop car to crime scene; chase robbers and shoot them to rescue the hostage. Play ultimate angry cop game, Bank Robbery ‚Äì Mafia Gangsters Shooting game against chasing for planned crimes. The robbers and gangsters are so well expert in the use of the ammunition of the fps shooting games and they can control the action and thrill of the action shooting games. With state of the art shooting experience in the first person shooting, robbers have easily beaten many superheroes of the legendary world including flying hero, captain hero, commando soldier and the incredible monster while fighting police and army. Now they have targeted the banks and have started the bank robbery. So there is need of the commando mission in the city as the mafia criminal has attacked the central city bank.Enjoy epic bank robber game in the criminal world of San Andreas and Vegas crime city. Unleash fear and innocent citizens of Vegas city in this multi tasked bank robbery game. Build a criminal underworld empire where scary gangster can rob city banks with mafia gang. Bank robbery is our latest introduction to crime games and hostage rescue games. As the city Police has lost control over these sneaky robbers and incidents of theft and looting are increasing with time, so private commandos are being hired. Police has decided to take action against these hostile gangsters by give control to the most talked about super rescue heroes in superhero games. Act as master bank robber ready to loot & take away everything from bank in this bank robbery game. We need one smart robber to execute the best plan in the big bank robbery that you can think. Make a perfect bank robbery plan to defeat cops and police men on the San Andreas, Vegas city and Miami streets trying to prevent and stop grand robbery. Escape the bank robbery crime scene by dodging cops while driving your super robber car or theft police car via escaping route.ABOUT US: We, Red Helmet Games, provide entertainment with responsibility to maintain quality. We always welcome feedback and comments.http://kaizentechstudio.com/https://www.facebook.com/kaizentechstudio/

comments: I like the game, and it's addictive, but the mechanics are absolutely flawed. There have been tons of instances where the game has unfairly screwed me or other player's over. 1. Places mystery boxes in front of the player who drives second, but not the first player. 2. Hills like to stop a ball, that is being shot full force by an iron club, in it's tracks. 3. The swinging spike balls only affect some players golf balls, but not others.  Things like this piss people off, because they expect the game to be fair. Those small things easily aid a player in losing a match.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont

Really has potential to be fun, but is pretty well stacked against you if you aren't spending money. I did well, won 60%, until I unlocked stage 6. Now I can't win in stage 3. I lose 5 or 6 times until I'm out of coins and have to wait to get some again. I couldn't even earn enough to enter tournament in a 3 days span. My skill level didn't suddenly drop off...
Very addicting. Can't stop playing it. Only wish you could get rid of some of the chests you don't want so you can keep the good ones
Uhm... Playing cod pissed me off so much because of the hacking I stopped playing. Same goes for this game..good luck to all that want to play and get ripped off. F U .

descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

comments: I just did 4x 10pulls and didnt get a single 5*. Seriously, that's just poor management. Last time I spend any money. Don't spend your cash, it wont be beneficial. I wish I coukd get a refund.

Serious detriment to wanting to continue to play if no matter how you level them up you still lose.
